Technology*: Ground Source Heat Pump (GSHP) / Geothermal HP
Program Description \n(guideline): Up to $500 per ton for qualifying Ground Source Heat Pumps
Equipment Standards Restrictions: Ground source heat pumps must also meet Energy Star EER and COP ratings
Other Restrictions: $250/ton for replacement units; $500/ton for new installations

Program Description \n(guideline): 50% of cost up to $1800 off qualifying Standard Air-Source Heat Pump
Rebate Value*: 50% of equipment cost, capped at $675 for <=2 tons, or $1,800 for >2 tons
Equipment Standards Restrictions: HSPF >= 9.0 and SEER >= 15 or HSPF2 >= 7.6 and SEER2 >= 14.3
Other Restrictions: Up to $675 for 2 tons or less; up to $1,800 for greater than 2 tons.

Program Description \n(guideline): 50% of cost up to $2400 off qualifying Cold Climate Air-Source Heat Pump
Rebate Value*: 50% of equipment cost, capped at $1,000 for <=2 tons, or $2,400 for >2 tons
Equipment Standards Restrictions: HSPF >= 9.0 and SEER >= 15 or HSPF2 >= 7.6 and SEER2 >= 14.3
Other Restrictions: Up to $1,000 for 2 tons or less; up to $2,400 for greater than 2 tons.

Program Description \n(guideline): 50% of cost up to $100/unit off Integrated Controlled Electric Thermal Storage Backup with Air Source Heat Pump

Technology*: Ground Source Heat Pump (GSHP) / Geothermal HP
Program Description \n(guideline): $200 per heating ton for qualifying Ground Source Heat Pumps
Equipment Standards Restrictions: Ground source heat pumps must also meet Energy Star EER and COP ratings
Other Restrictions: $200/ton for both new installations and replacements

Program Description \n(guideline): Up to $400 off qualifying Standard Air-Source Heat Pumps
Equipment Standards Restrictions: HSPF >= 9.0 and SEER >= 15 or HSPF2 >= 7.6 and SEER2 >= 14.3
Other Restrictions: $200 off for 2 tons or less; $400 for greater than 2 tons

Program Description \n(guideline): $600 off qualifying Cold Climate Air-Source Heat Pump
Equipment Standards Restrictions: HSPF >= 10.0 and SEER >= 16 or HSPF2 >= 8.5 and SEER2 >= 15.2, with minimum of 3 stages or variable speed
Other Restrictions: $300 off for 2 tons or less; $600 for greater than 2 tons
